messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 786
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to say hi and touch base. :-) It is SO good to hear from you Alice!! We miss you terrible down here...your name comes up often. The first time we
messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to say hi and touch base. :-)

It is SO good to hear from you Alice!!
We miss you terrible down here...your name comes up often.
The first time we went to the park after you moved, the kids were all excited
until we got there and they realized you guys weren't coming.
Sierra was talking about "my other friend Rachel" a few days ago.
Sigh....

The group has taken off. We have new folks almost weekly some months. Radical
unschoolers among them, some with young children that the unschooling
resonates with and they're thrilled to find a group that understands.
A few school at home types mixed in to keep things interesting. :)

You met Theresa right? I met her at the conference and we talked about her
meeting you but I can't remember if you actually met or she was planning it.
??
Hope you'll be around more....we sure miss ya!

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
